title: Reprehensible Abuse and Racist Comments
body:
A player added me after a game and sent these messages. Red can check logs I said absolutely nothing that would warrant these kind of comments, not that there are any circumstances where these comments are OK anyway.

The player told me to "k*ll mys*lf" amongst other defamatory comments. I didn't want to write it in the post but I have uploaded screenshots.

I have uploaded the conversation as screenshots to imgur:
(The forum post shows a preview of the first image, if you click on the image it takes you to the full post)

https://imgur.com/a/KeiYTpR

Thanks

replies.body:
This is the kind of thing you should report to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

There are two important things to note here however:

1. Support cannot give *any* information about another player's account, explicit or implicit, so you will likely get a generic "thanks for raising this, we can't tell you anything" type response.
2. Given that this occurred in private messages, there may not be anything they can actually do. When it comes to things like threats, there are avenues that can be taken, but when you voluntarily add the player, it limits the actions they can take. I'm unsure if they're even allowed to keep records of private messages, in which case there is very little they would be able to do (since they'd have no records and can't confirm if a given screenshot is doctored or not).
